text: int highest = 0 ; int trianglesum ( int * * array , int sum , int rowindex , int rowno , int maxrow ) { sum += array [ rowno ] [ rowindex ] ; if ( rowno == maxrow ) { if ( sum > highest ) { highest = sum ; } return 1 ; } trianglesum ( array , sum , rowindex , rowno + 1 , maxrow ) ; trianglesum ( array , sum , rowindex + 1 , rowno + 1 , maxrow ) ; return 0 ; } int main ( ) { int tests ; int rows ; int i , j , k ; int * * triangle ; scanf ( "%d" , & tests ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < tests ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & rows ) ; triangle = malloc ( sizeof ( int * ) * rows ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < rows ; j ++ ) { triangle [ j ] = malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * ( j + 1 ) ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < j + 1 ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & ( triangle [ j ] [ k ] ) ) ; } } trianglesum ( triangle , 0 , 0 , 0 , rows - 1 ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , highest ) ; } }
